title: Salade de PÃ¢tes au Giraumon (Pasta Salad with Giraumon Squash)

instructions.instruction_text: Cook the pasta al dente according to package instructions in salted boiling water.
While pasta cooks, wash and dry all vegetables and peppers.
Peel the giraumon squash and cut into small dice (less than 1 cm cubes).
Cut the zucchini in half lengthwise, then slice into thin half-moon shapes.
Finely slice the red onion into thin rings or strips.
Roughly chop the sun-dried tomatoes into small pieces.
Remove stems from the peppers and slice them thinly.
Before draining the pasta, reserve 60g (about 1/4 cup) of the pasta cooking water.
Drain the pasta and return it to the hot pot immediately.
Add all the raw vegetables (giraumon, zucchini, red onion, peppers) and sun-dried tomatoes to the hot pasta.
Pour the olive oil over the pasta and vegetables. Mix well to combine.
Cover the pot with a lid and let sit for 2-3 minutes, allowing the vegetables to cook slightly in the residual heat from the pasta.
Taste and adjust seasoning with salt. Serve warm, or let cool to room temperature for a refreshing pasta salad.
